ygData.subject: Verant ruined the revive line of spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I just did a revive on myself yesterday and was damn surprised to the result. Usually all it does is teleport to corpse and return a little xp. But at that
ygData.messageBody:
I just did a revive on myself yesterday and was damn surprised to the result. Usually
all it does is teleport to corpse and return a little xp. But at that time it did a whole
lot more. And all of them were negative side effects. After resurrection i had all my
mana drained, had only 50% of HP, had some kind of weakness effect on me and
all this without any addition to the positive effects (xp gain). I feel this is a terribly
wrong move by Verant. And besides they did not mention a thing about it in the
patch message. Why the heck did they do something like this? Do they want to
ruin the cleric now that it is perfectly balanced? That would be awfully stupid.

Iyenya Goldenheart
Lvl 30 dwarf cleric
Innoruuk server
